message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I take $60 and you get $40. It's important to make a deal quickly before inflation eats away at our potential earnings.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, as it's closer to an even division.  Let's make a deal before the money starts to lose value too much.
Bob, time is running out and we both lose if we don't agree.  My offer is still generous considering I made the first move.  Let's settle on this so we both benefit.
